officialTitle: Increasing Receipt of Guideline Concordant Survivorship Care Among Black Breast Cancer Survivors Through Patient Education
conditions: Breast Cancer, Breast Neoplasms, Breast Carcinoma, Breast Cancer Female
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Female
* Self-identified Black or African American race
* Age 22-79
* Diagnosis of Stage I, II, or III invasive breast cancer
* Completed active treatment at least 6 months ago, but within the past five years
* Speaks English

Exclusion Criteria:

* Undergoing active treatment (i.e., surgery, chemotherapy, radiation)
* Undergoing evaluation for suspected recurrence
